# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/customerReviews | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/customerReviews ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-customerReviews)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/customerReviews 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/customerReviews

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-customerReviews#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/customerReviews
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-customerReviews#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-customerReviews#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-customerReviews#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppCustomerReviewsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appcustomerreviewslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-customerReviews#see-also)

### [Getting customer reviews](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-customerReviews#Getting-customer-reviews)

[`List All Customer Reviews for an App`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-customerreviews)Get a list of customer reviews for a specific app.[`Read customer review summarizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-customerreviewsummarizations)Get the customer review summarization for a specific app.
